content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 62.0, -54.0) with current fuel of 1 coal and an inventory containing 49 iron ore and 0 iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource patch before attempting to harvest. Move closer if necessary.

### Errors related to smelting
- Check that the stone furnace has both fuel and the required ingredients to smelt. If the furnace reports "no ingredients to smelt," ensure that you have inserted the necessary items.
- Monitor the furnace's fuel and input levels to avoid smelting timeouts.
- The furnace may report being full of plates or lacking ore to process. Ensure that you are managing the inventory effectively.
- The stone furnace is repeatedly reporting "smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs." Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel and that the input items are available. If the furnace is full, consider removing some items before inserting more.

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the stone furnace. If you receive a "No iron-ore to insert from your inventory" error, check your inventory for the necessary resources.
- Avoid attempting to insert items when the LuaItemStack is invalid. Ensure that the item stack is valid before performing the insert operation.

### Repeated smelting timeout errors
- The stone furnace is repeatedly reporting "smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs." Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel and that the input items are available. If the furnace is full, consider removing some items before inserting more.

### Errors related to fuel levels
- Monitor the fuel levels of the stone furnace closely. If the fuel drops too low, it may stop functioning. Ensure you have a sufficient supply of fuel to keep the furnace operational.
- Ensure to refill the stone furnace with fuel before it runs out completely. Plan ahead to maintain a steady supply of fuel.

### Errors when the stone furnace runs out of fuel
- The furnace may stop functioning if it runs out of fuel. Always keep track of the fuel levels and replenish them as needed.

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from contains the item you wish to extract. If you receive an error stating "Could not find a valid entity containing iron-plate," verify the inventory of the stone furnace and ensure it has the items available for extraction.
- The stone furnace is reporting "Could not extract iron-plate" multiple times. Verify that the furnace has iron plates available for extraction before attempting to extract them.
